#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int a[1000];
bool solve(int sum,int n)
{
    if(sum<0)
        return false;
    if(sum==0)
        return true;
    if(n==0&&sum!=0)
        return false;
    return solve(sum,n-1)||solve(sum-a[n-1],n-1);
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,x;
        cin>>n>>x;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>a[i];
        if(solve(x,n))
            cout<<"YES\n";
        else
            cout<<"NO\n";

    }
}
